function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Droplet transmission of infectious agents (eg. influenza virus) within a 1-2 meter range through respiratory droplets and direct or indirect contact.","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in healthcare facilities and built environments.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce droplet transmission, such as using personal protective equipment, improving ventilation, and maintaining proper hygiene practices.","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HEPA filters, UV-C germicidal lamps, and HVAC systems with advanced filtration.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors, and individuals in built environments.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, building management, public health authorities, and individuals."}]}
